page.title: 16CUSTOMS
page.content:
FOLKLORE: (Grown up as tradition, may not be true.) Horseblock Hollow - During the Civil War, the hollow was filled with a barricade made of the bodies of shot horses.
Surrey Puma - Puma like animal "seen" by many people up until a few years ago.
Summerfold House -During their court ship the Duke of Windsor and Mrs. Simpson stayed in this house. A ditch was dug and police patrolled to keep away the curious. The house was derelict after the war, but has recently been restored. The bedroom that is attributed to be the one the Windsors used is a lovely room with windows on three sides.
